comment._content: Here's biographical information about Charles Templeton Crocker (1884-1948), grandson of railroad magnate and member of the "The Big Four", Charles Crocker: researcharchive.calacademy.org/research/library/special/f... This mansion was designed by Willis Polk and was a gift to his wife, sugar heiress Helene Irwin. Today it is used as a school. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crystal_Springs_Uplands_School
